an7.62:1.2: yadidaṁ puññāni → yadidaṁ puññanti (bj); yadidaṁ puññānanti (sya-all, pts1ed, csp1ed)
an7.62:1.3: bhikkhave, dīgharattaṁ katānaṁ puññānaṁ dīgharattaṁ iṭṭhaṁ → bhikkhave dīgharattaṁ iṭṭhaṁ (sya1ed, sya2ed), bhikkhave dīgharattaṁ puññānaṁ iṭṭhaṁ (?)
an7.62:2.7: ajjhāvasinti → ajjhāvasati (si, mr); ajjhāvasanti (cck, sya1ed, pts1ed)
an7.62:10.2: pathabyo me na vipajjati → puthavyo yena vuccati (bj, sya-all, pts1ed)
an7.62:12.1: attakāmena → atthakāmena (bj, cck, sya1ed, pts1ed, mr)
